property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable
property.description: Determines if log aggregation should be enabled. When it is enabled, logs for map reduce jobs will be aggregated using this method only if yarn.use-central-logging-for-mapreduce-only is set to false.

property.name: yarn.use-central-logging-for-mapreduce-only
property.description: Determines if MapR central logging should be enabled. This is only applicable for map reduce jobs. So to keep logs in MapRFS for other applications, enable log aggregation.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds
property.description: Determines how long to keep the logs in MapRFS. Defaults to 30 days if not specified.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-check-interval-seconds
property.description: Determines how often to perform log retention checks. When set to the default value of -1, the check time will be set to 1/10th of the retention time. So it will be 3 days when retention time is 30 days.
